member.name: T:ContactsManager.API.UnityConfig
member.summary: Specifies the Unity configuration for the main container.

member.name: M:ContactsManager.API.UnityConfig.RegisterTypes(Unity.IUnityContainer)
member.summary: Registers the type mappings with the Unity container.
member.remarks: There is no need to register concrete types such as controllers or API controllers (unless you want to change the defaults), as Unity allows resolving a concrete type even if it was not previously registered.

member.name: T:ContactsManager.API.UnityWebApiActivator
member.summary: Provides the bootstrapping for integrating Unity with WebApi when it is hosted in ASP.NET.

member.name: M:ContactsManager.API.UnityWebApiActivator.Start
member.summary: Integrates Unity when the application starts.

member.name: M:ContactsManager.API.UnityWebApiActivator.Shutdown
member.summary: Disposes the Unity container when the application is shut down.

member.name: T:ContactsManager.API.Controllers.ContactsController
member.summary: ContactsController Contains Below mentioned API's - GetContacts: Retrives all the contacts whose status is true (Active) - AddContact: Adds new contact information to the system. Will validate each request parameters according to the business rules. - EditContact: Edits contact information based on contact information unique Id. - DeleteContact: Updates the status of specific contact Can be either true (Active) || false (InActive)

member.name: M:ContactsManager.API.Controllers.ContactsController.AddContact(ContactsManager.API.Models.ContactDetailRequestModel)
member.summary: Saving Contact Information to the system.

member.name: M:ContactsManager.API.Controllers.ContactsController.EditContact(ContactsManager.API.Models.ContactDetailRequestModel,System.Guid)
member.summary: Update Contact Detail based on ContactId

member.name: M:ContactsManager.API.Controllers.ContactsController.DeleteContact(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Delete Contact Detail with respect to Contact Id

member.name: P:ContactsManager.API.Models.ContactDetailRequestModel.PhoneNumber
member.summary: Identifies Phone Number of Customer. (Only 10 digit mobile number with country code is accepted. e.g. +919730823490)

member.name: P:ContactsManager.API.Models.ContactDetailRequestModel.Status
member.summary: Identifies if respective Contact Information is Active or Not

member.summary: Identifies Phone Number of Customer. (Only 10 digit mobile number with country code is accepted. e.g. +91 9730823490)

member.name: P:ContactsManager.API.Models.ContactDetailResponseModel.Status
member.summary: Identifies if respective Contact Information is Active or Not
